Title: Halo 3 Statistics Aggregator
Description:
Statistics for each matchmaking and custom game in Halo 3 is saved to their website at http://www.bungie.net.  These classes will help users screen-scrape their stats from the website.  

Built using the .NET Framework 3.5, Visual Studio 2008, HTMLAgilityPack, ParallelFX Dec CTP, and the CarlosAg WebChart Control for ASP.NET.
